recipesJson.name: Bourbon sweet potato  cupcake
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description:
Inw lemon cake was a great base to build this profile off of. And then the rest of the recipe just snowballed together. Aged bourbon cream is the first bourbon flavor I've actually liked. Having a little Jamaica special to boost the sweetness alcohol of the profile.  hope you enjoy!


If you'd like to participate in the Year of Mixing find the Flavor-Pro group and join us for our weekly challenge - all mixers welcome - and there will be some prizes. You can find more information here http://flavor-pro.com/the-year-of-mixing/
